posts.text:
Sælir
Er með slatta af gömlum bókum sem fást fyrir lítið, flestar eru lítið sem ekkert notaðar. Er ekki nógu gott nörd til að heillast af forritun, meira fyrir grafíkina.
Er til í að skipta á bókunum og Magic the gathering spilum (fynn ekki mín gömlu)  
 
Skoða öll tilboð í bækurnar (>500 kr) og gef afslátt ef fleiri en ein er keypt saman.
Skilaboð hér eða á joigisla hjá g-pósti
1.	microsoft sql server 2000 database design and implementation exam 70-229 second edition (2003)
http://www.amazon.com/MCAD-MCDBA-Self-Paced-Training-Pro-Certification/dp/0735619603
Fæst gefins ef keypt er önnur bók
2.	build your own asp.net website using c & vb.net (2004 32$)
http://www.amazon.com/Build-ASP-NET-Website-Using-VB-NET/dp/0957921861
1000 kr
3.	actionscript 3.0 cookbook  (2006 – 26$)
http://www.amazon.com/ActionScript-3-0-Cookbook-Application-Developers/dp/0596526954
1500 kr
4.	flash cs3 the missing manual  (2007-25$)
http://www.amazon.com/Flash-CS3-Missing-Vander-Veer/dp/0596510446
1000 kr
5.	essential actionscript 3.0 (2007 -30$)
http://www.amazon.com/Essential-ActionScript-3-0-Colin-Moock/dp/0596526946
1500kr
6.	css the definitive guide 3rd edition  (2006 27$)
http://www.amazon.com/CSS-Definitive-Guide-Eric-Meyer/dp/0596527330
1500 kr
7.	web database application with php and mysql 2nd edition  (2004 30$)
http://www.amazon.com/Web-Database-Applications-PHP-MySQL/dp/0596005431/ref=sr_1_1?s=books&ie=UTF8&qid=1307466452&sr=1-1
1500 kr
8.	programming php 2nd edition (2006 – 26$)
http://www.amazon.com/Programming-PHP-Rasmus-Lerdorf/dp/0596006810
2000 kr
9.	javascript the definitive guide 5th edition  (2006) 6. útgáfa 32$
http://www.amazon.com/JavaScript-Definitive-Guide-David-Flanagan/dp/0596101996
2000 kr
Endilega komið með boð ef áhugi er fyrir.
